howToGetIt: The San Francisco Day Labor Program is a worker-run collective that unites immigrant men to build community, strengthen skills in general day labor, and find dignified job placements. Jobs typically involve construction, maintenance, moving, gardening, or painting. If you are interested in joining the SF Day Labor Program, contact them at (415) 252-5375. The Women’s Collective is a worker-run collective that empowers immigrant women to build community support, develop skills in domestic work, and receive job placement assistance. Jobs typically involve cleaning and other forms of housework. If you are interested in joining the Women’s Collective, contact them at (415) 252-5376.
agency: Mission Action (formerly Dolores Street Community Services)
